info.title: Large Scale Environment
info.description: A high performance environment leveraging large-scale 3D Tiles and adaptive streaming for seamless, real-time exploration.

steps.title: Multi-Format Compatibility
steps.description: Combines IFC files, OBJ, and other formats in the same scene.

steps.title: High-Performance Geospatial Streaming
steps.description: Renders large-scale geospatial datasets without performance loss, maintaining visual fidelity.
